t: New ways for shoppers to follow brands on Amazon | Amazon Ads
s: October 26, 2021 - We’ve expanded Brand Follow to make it easier for shoppers to follow their favorite brands in Amazon’s store. To follow a brand, shoppers can simply hit the ‘Follow’ button, which has been included as an every-day part of the shopping experience –across Stores, Posts, and Amazon Live.
